title: Constructing Weakly Solvating Electrolytes for Next-Generation Zn-ion Batteries
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE03209H, Minireview
Diyu Xu, Dezhou Zheng, Fuxin Wang, Xuefeng Shang, Yi Wang, Xihong Lu
Zn-ion batteries (ZIBs) are considered as a viable candidate for grid-scale energy storage with admirable capacity, high safety and low cost, but are severely hampered by the undesirable dendrite growth...
